评论概述: Good at first, got worse throughout the year
评论详情: I bought this at the beginning of the school year (august), and it was great at first. The zippers would get stuck every now and then, but it didn’t seem like a big deal. Over time, the quality got worse. The zippers would get completely undone and break off. The straps I had to sew in the beginning because they would slide right through. I was taking the bag out of my car, and the left strap completely broke. I had to tie it on so it would stay. I love the design and color, and it fits all of my stuff pretty well (high school things), but it gets pretty heavy too. The bag does its job, though for how much it cost, so cost wise it was probably worth it. I do wish the quality was better though.
My 4th grade used it for the whole school year.

My granddaughter loved the bag very much. She used it for about a month and a half and the strap broke no way to put it back together. I was so disappointed and so was She. She wanted me to re-order but I didn’t want to spend the money and have that happen again.

Very fun and stylish backpack. Bought this for my niece to start the school year in style. She actually picked it out and loves it. It has all the pockets, compartments, and most importantly cup holder on the side. Seems very durable, I’m sure it’ll survive 6th grade!
My daughter was SO excited for this. For whatever reason, the straps don’t hold right, so it can slip off her back. And the top part is already starting to rip open. It’s cute, that’s about it.
My 8th grade daughter loves this and is very happy with it. The size and durability are perfect.

My daughter loved the detail ok the bag, but within one week the straps had already broken. I had to tie the ends so they wouldn’t slip through the adjusters until I got her new one. Very poor quality

Bought this for my high school student for her back to school backpack.  We are just starting week 3 and the zipper on the back pack has already broken.  Backpack is not durable.  She used it for 10 days, and it’s already broken.

My HS Junior wanted a smaller cuter pack this year for school and she found this one.  It’s cute BUT it’s not very sturdy.  If she were younger and hard on her back pack I don’t believe it would last the entire school year. That said it is cute just flimsy.
Great thick material on bag, good zippers thick straps and exactly as pictured

I've been using it daily for work & it has been very durable so far! Lots of space, plus can fit larger water bottles in the side holders! (Also loved the stash pocket in the back) Star designs pop & has been pretty water proof so far :)
I liked that it match my wardrobe!
Cute bookbag.  Looks as shown in description. Has plenty of room inside.

High quality backpack, smooth waterproof material, interior has lining and multiple pockets, pockets for 2 water bottles, outside pocket, and my favorite is the smaller pocket in back to fit phone, wallet. Zips ok. Unisex and perfect for son to take his essentials to gym, school, or travels.
Muy bonita y muy amplia, la tela se siente resistente, espero que con el uso no se degrade la calidad.
